panels.description: The percentage of sessions using the selected browser.
panels.title: Adoption

panels.description: The number of sessions for the selected period and browser.
panels.title: Sessions

panels.description: The Success Rate measures player reliability as the ratio of START to ERROR events, excluding failures caused by blocked reasons or unsupported DRM errors.
panels.title: Success Rate

panels.description: Error Type Breakdown for the selected browser and time range.
panels.title: Error Type Breakdown

panels.description:
This panel shows the share of total errors attributed to each operating system.
Percentages represent the volume of errors per OS relative to all collected errors.
panels.title: Error Share by Operating System

panels.description:
This panel shows the relative distribution of error types for each operating system.
Percentages indicate the share of each error type among total errors for that OS.
panels.title: Error Type Distribution by Operating System
